participant_1.background:

I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i have been married eight years.

i am content with my life.

content.text: Hey there! I just got home from work.
Nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a lifeguard at the local pool.
Oh cool! I wish I could swim, I'm too afraid of drowning.
Don't worry, as long as you follow the rules, you'll be fine.
I guess so. I just love cold winters and strong breezes.
I'm not a big fan of the cold, but I do enjoy playing fetch with my dog in the snow.
Oh nice! I just finished playing fetch with my dog. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
Oh I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
Yeah, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
I bet. I'm glad you're happy with your life.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
